stimulusHtml: Although Jacob Lawrence’s The Migration of the Negro, Panel no. 49 and Doris Salcedo’s Shibboleth use very different media, they are similar in that both
choicesHtml: incorporate multiple repetitions of imagery that represent the anonymity of modern urban life
appropriate visual elements from other works to question cultural norms and stereotypes
incorporate culturally charged materials to comment on deeply rooted social injustice
focus the attention of the viewer on a central line that represents societal divisions
